attributes.action: Petition of no confidence in this government.
attributes.additional_details: Countless people have no confidence in Boris Johnson and his whole cabinet as they have shown total incompetence at every turn and their handling of the Covid 19 pandemic has been a total disgrace resulting in many thousands of needless deaths and infections. Also the prime minister is a proven liar many times over who clearly cares nothing about the British people unless they are part of the elite. This prime minister and his government are not fit for purpose.
attributes.background: Vote of no confidence in this government
